results.name: a(n) = n mod sum of digits of n in factorial base.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10080
Index entries for sequences related to factorial base representation
program: def a007623(n, p=2): return n if n
return n % sum(int(k) for k in str(a007623(n)))
print([a(n) for n in range(1, 201)]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Jun 21 2017
xref: Cf. A118363 (positions of zeros), A286607 (of nonzeros).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 18 2017
